MineVille is down every single time in prime time.

The lobby is the only thing working, but when you want to join a Minigame, it says "Can not connect to server".

How can Microsoft keep allowing such server to be offered as offical server on Bedrock, when the devloper clearly doesn't care to keep the servers running.

They only have 900 players max, and other servers has way more players without any issue.

But MineVille has issues every single day!

So why is Microsoft allowing such bad provider on the Bedrock server list?

I like it but after a raid should happen.
Maybe you should only see the player locator bar and be seen by the player locator bar if you hold a player locator compass, crafted with 8 resin blocks and a compass.

For the compass idea, it would be interesting if it was possible to connect compasses, like with maps, then a player would be able to find another player, as long the other player has a compass with the same connection.
Not necessarily limited to two compasses, you could have multiple ones that show all the others in the "same frequency".

As well as only showing the player locator bar if you are holding a compass, I think only players holding an unlinked (not lodestone or recovery) compass (in hand or in hotbar, I don't know) should show up on the player locator bar.

So if two players are trying to find each other, the compasses would lead them to each other instead of to the worldspawn.

The bar could also show a dot pointing to the lodestone connected to the compass.

The color of the dot could also be an average of the color of the block beneath the lodestone, just as noteblock have different instruments depending on the block beneath them.

I think this could be better as its own item instead of adding it to the compass. 

call it the Locator compass and give it a more blueish hue to it to distinguish it between a regular compass.

That's a awesome idea man, being able to make unbreakable tools and armor would be cool, because of armor trims IMO,
And it also helps for leather armor because it wil finally get used.
